it's actually llvm which is broken
```x86_64-apple-darwin14-cc -o /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/fortran/hello_world/hello_world -g -O2 /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/fortran/hello_world/hello_world.o -lgfortran -lm -lquadmath
/opt/bin/x86_64-apple-darwin14-libgfortran5-cxx11/dsymutil: line 5: /opt/x86_64-apple-darwin14/bin/llvm-dsymutil: No such file or directory
collect2: fatal error: dsymutil returned 127 exit status
compilation terminated.
make[1]: *** [Makefile:8: /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/c/openmp/openmp] Error 1
make: *** [Makefile:31: install-c-openmp] Error 2```
which makes even less sense to me, since we've only touched GCC :confused:

text:
ok, now back to kholin where I have the shard already (taking forever on my machine).  with latest BBB:
```julia> BinaryBuilderBase.runshell(Platform("x86_64", "macos"); preferred_gcc_version=v"7", verbose=false, compilers=[:c, :rust, :go])
sandbox:${WORKSPACE} # cd /usr/share/testsuite/
sandbox:/usr/share/testsuite # make
x86_64-apple-darwin14-cc -o /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/c/hello_world/hello_world -g -O2 hello_world.c
x86_64-apple-darwin14-c++ -o /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/cxx/hello_world/hello_world -g -O2 <http://hello_world.cc|hello_world.cc>
x86_64-apple-darwin14-f77 -o /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/fortran/hello_world/hello_world.o -c hello_world.f
x86_64-apple-darwin14-cc -o /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/fortran/hello_world/hello_world -g -O2 /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/fortran/hello_world/hello_world.o -lgfortran -lm -lquadmath
x86_64-apple-darwin14-f77 -o /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/fortran/hello_world/hello_world hello_world.f
x86_64-apple-darwin14-go build -o /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/go/hello_world/hello_world hello_world.go
x86_64-apple-darwin14-rustc -o /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/rust/hello_world/hello_world <http://hello_world.rs|hello_world.rs>
x86_64-apple-darwin14-cc -shared -o /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/c/dyn_link/libfoo/libfoo.dylib -fPIC -g -O2 -lm libfoo/libfoo.c
x86_64-apple-darwin14-cc -o /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/c/dyn_link/dyn_link -I/usr/share/testsuite/c/dyn_link/libfoo -fPIC -g -O2 -Wl,-rpath,@loader_path/libfoo -L/tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/c/dyn_link/libfoo -lfoo dyn_link.c
x86_64-apple-darwin14-c++ -shared -o /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/cxx/dyn_link/librepeater/librepeater.dylib -fPIC -g -O2 -lm librepeater/librepeater.cc
x86_64-apple-darwin14-c++ -o /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/cxx/dyn_link/dyn_link -I/usr/share/testsuite/cxx/dyn_link/librepeater -fPIC -g -O2 -Wl,-rpath,@loader_path/librepeater -L/tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/cxx/dyn_link/librepeater -lrepeater <http://dyn_link.cc|dyn_link.cc>
gcc -o /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/c/openmp/openmp -g -O2 -fopenmp openmp.c
/opt/bin/x86_64-apple-darwin14-libgfortran4-cxx11/dsymutil: line 5: /opt/x86_64-apple-darwin14/bin/llvm-dsymutil: No such file or directory
collect2: fatal error: dsymutil returned 127 exit status
compilation terminated.
make[1]: *** [Makefile:8: /tmp/testsuite/x86_64-apple-darwin14/c/openmp/openmp] Error 1
make: *** [Makefile:28: build-c-openmp] Error 2```

text: sigh
so we have 7,8 10 broken
